mapper.select: SELECT A.* , B.nickname, C.title AS productTitle, C.iboard FROM lagarto_customer A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN lagarto_main C ON A.product_num = C.iboard WHERE A.board_type = ${board_type} ORDER BY A.iboard DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lararto_customer (board_type, title, ctnt, ctnt_img, iuser) VALUES (${board_type}, #{title}, #{ctnt}, #{ctnt_img}, ${iuser})
